pr_title: Set batch-2.0 and related features to beta

timeline.bodyText: batchManagement was not part of the convenience feature in 8.  Is there a reason for it to be part of it in 9?  liberty is spelled wrong for the feature though.  If you want it to be in the beta image for Jakarta 9 and it doesn't belong in the convenience feature, you should add it to dev/build.image/profiles/jakartaee9/features.xml.  Confirm with @tevans78
timeline.author: jhanders34
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,6 +13,8 @@ Subsystem-Name: Jakarta EE Platform 9.0
  com.ibm.websphere.appserver.transaction-2.0,\
  io.openliberty.appAuthorization-2.0,\
  io.openliberty.appClientSupport-2.0,\
+ io.openliberty.batch-2.0,\
+ io.openliberth.batchManagement-2.0,\

timeline.bodyText: If you don't have batchManager 1.0 also in your environment, batchManager scripts won't work I believe.  As such maybe batchManager shouldn't be marked beta, yet?  Is it needed for the CTS?
timeline.author: jhanders34

timeline.message: Set batch-2.0 and related features to beta
Set batch-2.0 and related features to beta
